responses.s0_q0: Yes: The strategy is documented, covers all 12 NDP domains, and is reviewed/updated annually.
responses.s0_q1: Partially: Some governance roles or committees exist, but not a full unit or office.
responses.s0_q2: Yes: The policy is published, communicated, and aligned with NDP requirements.
responses.s0_q3: Partially: Some roles are defined, but not comprehensively or not assigned.
responses.s1_q0: Partially: Architecture is partially developed or not regularly maintained.
responses.s1_q1: Yes: An EDM is in place, covering descriptive, diagnostic, predictive, and prescriptive analytics.
responses.s1_q2: Yes: All models are reviewed and approved by NPC.
responses.s2_q0: Yes: The policy is published and aligned with national standards.
responses.s2_q1: Partially: Some activities are conducted, but not systematically or regularly.
responses.s2_q2: Yes: Scorecards and KPIs are implemented and actively monitored.
responses.s3_q0: Partially: A policy exists but is incomplete or not aligned.
responses.s3_q1: Yes: A comprehensive MDM program and plan are operational.
responses.s3_q2: Partially: Some coordination/approval has occurred, but not comprehensively.
responses.s4_q0: Partially: Policy/program exists but is incomplete or covers only part of the lifecycle.
responses.s4_q1: Partially: Some digitalization efforts are underway, but not comprehensive.
responses.s5_q0: Partially: Some cataloging/metadata management exists, but not fully implemented.
responses.s5_q1: Yes: Metadata structure fully aligns with NPC standards.
responses.s6_q0: Partially: Some policies exist, but not fully compliant or reviewed.
responses.s6_q1: No: No compliant storage solutions exist.
responses.s7_q0: Partially: Policy exists but is not published or fully implemented.
responses.s7_q1: Yes: All data sharing is secure and compliant.
responses.s7_q2: Yes: Actively participates in the National Data Marketplace.
responses.s8_q0: No: No alignment with strategic objectives.
responses.s8_q2: No: No compliance with NQAF/international standards.
responses.s9_q0: Partially: Some opportunities identified, but not fully compliant or documented.
responses.s9_q1: Partially: Some efforts or plans exist, but not comprehensive.
